sentences.en: All the crockery had been smashed to bits.
sentences.cn: 所有的陶器都摔成了碎片.

sentences.en: And I like your beautiful crockery, Where did you pick this up?
sentences.cn: 我喜欢你那漂亮的陶器, 从哪儿搞来的?

sentences.en: Frank gently lifted the crockery out of the box and suddenly noticed a miniature painting at the bottom of the packing - case.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克从箱子里轻轻地拎出陶器,突然发现箱底有一张微型油画.

sentences.en: His room a litter of old clothes, dirty crockery and broken furniture.
sentences.cn: 他的屋子里到处都是旧衣物 、 脏陶器和破家具.

sentences.en: I have a slight accident at home and break some crockery.
sentences.cn: 我在家出了点儿小事,打碎了些陶器.

sentences.en: Introduced the research and results of low temperature sinter horniness crockery.
sentences.cn: 介绍了硬质陶器低温烧成的研究及其结果.

sentences.en: Its crockery and atmosphere were thick; its soup and napery thin.
sentences.cn: 它的碗具粗糙,空气混浊, 汤菜淡如水,餐巾薄如绢.

sentences.en: Most of the crockery was still in one piece.
She bumped against the table and sent the crockery crashing to the ground.
sentences.cn: 她撞在桌子上,使陶器哗啦一声碎落到地上.

sentences.en: We are going to insure the crockery with the PICC.
sentences.cn: 我们正打算向PICC保险这批陶器呢?

sentences.en: While you are on the phone, the baby pulls the table - cloth off the table. smashing half your best crockery and cutting himself in the process.
sentences.cn: 你接电话时小孩把桌布扯了下来, 把你最好的陶器打碎了一半,同时他还把自己磕破了.

sentences.en: You don't find that foreign birds and butterflies come and perch upon your crockery.
sentences.cn: 你们并没看见过奇奇怪怪的鸟儿和蝴蝶飞来落在碗盏上.

sentences.en: You hang up hurriedly and attend to baby, crockery, etc.
sentences.cn: 你慌忙挂上电话,去照料孩子, 去收拾陶器, 等等.

sentences.en: You hang up hurriedly and attend to baby, crockery, etc. Meanwhile, the meal gets burnt.
sentences.cn: 你慌忙挂上电话,去照料孩子, 收拾陶器, 等等.这时饭烧糊了.

sentences.en: You hang up hurriedly and attend to the baby, crockery, etc.
sentences.cn: 你急急忙忙挂上电话, 赶去照看孩子和餐具.
